articles.description: “We’re not leaving the fight,” he told supporters and members of his staff as he prepared to leave Washington.
articles.content:
For four years as president, and for almost a half-century more in public life, Joseph R. Biden Jr. professed an optimistic, ironclad belief in the strength of America’s democracy.

articles.title: US Senate passes migrant detention bill hours after Trump sworn in
articles.description: Laken Riley Act, which passed 64-35, requires detention of undocumented migrants charged with theft-related crimes
articles.content:
The Senate has passed legislation requiring the detention of undocumented immigrants charged with theft-related crimes, with the chamber approving its first bill of the new Congress just hours after Donald Trump took the oath of office.

articles.title: Donald Trump pulls US out of Paris climate agreement
articles.description: Donald Trump has taken the US out of the Paris agreement, the international treaty to fight climate change.
articles.content:
Donald Trump has once again taken the US out of the landmark Paris climate agreement, abandoning the global effort to limit climate change. Trump signed an executive order today to exit.

articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Calls for Closer Scrutiny of Trade Deficits and China's Deal Compliance
articles.description: President Donald Trump issues a directive to federal agencies to investigate U.S. trade deficits and address unfair trade practices and currency manipulation. The memo instructs a review of China's compliance with the 'Phase 1' trade deal, signed in 2020, amid unmet purchase targets due to COVID-19.
